creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: blue with embroidered center with 9 pictographs (scenes of human activity with flora and fauna) with black embroidered corners; pink, green, red and black with metallic trim; band has 8 human figures embroidered across top; very long ties with fringe on one end and pouch on other; bottom loop has ties
title: Baby Carrier
